data.title: Town hall, mayor, stats, schools, attractions, and more
data.meta_description: Located in Delaware, the Town of Bridgeville has a lot to discover. Find more about its Town Hall, Mayor, Schools, Banks, Passport Facilities, and Leisure Activities.
data.text:
The Town of Bridgeville is located in the state of Delaware, in Sussex County. Its area, population and other key information are listed below.

For all your administrative procedures, you can go to the Town hall of Bridgeville at the address and schedules indicated on this page or contact the Town hall government by phone or by email depending on your preference or on the service's availability.

Update data

Where is Bridgeville, Delaware ?

Bridgeville is situated in Sussex County, within the state of Delaware, USA. It lies in the southern part of the state, approximately 30 miles south of Dover and 40 miles west of Rehoboth Beach. Positioned near the Maryland border, it provides easy access to significant regional routes and neighboring municipalities such as Seaford and Georgetown.
